name: Hoyt_Vandenberg
text:
Hoyt Vandenberg
Hoyt Vandenberg was a United States Air Force General and Acting Commanding General of Project Sign.
Vandenberg was present for Project Sign's inaugural meeting at Wright-Patterson Air Force Base in late 1947.
Behind the scenes
Hoyt Vandenberg (January 24, 1899 – April 2, 1954) was the United States Air Force's second Chief of Staff and Director of the Central Intelligence Agency.
